Vitamin E
	


	
summary

		
		One mg vitamin E (alpha-tocopherol) is equivalent
		1 mg RRR-alpha-tocopherol 
		2 mg all rac-alpha-tocopherol. 
		
		Because insufficient data are available 
		to develop RDAs for infants, 
		
		AIs were developed based on the amount of 
		vitamin E consumed by healthy breastfed babies.

	
forecast equivalents

		# later equivalents
